name: find_errors_in_file
description: Use this prompt when you need to find errors in Sentry for a given file.

organizationSlug.description: The organization's slug. You can find a existing list of organizations you have access to using the `find_organizations()` tool.

filename.description: The filename to search for errors in.

name: fix_issue_with_seer
description:
Use this prompt when you need to fix an issue with Seer.
You can pass in either an `issueId` and `organizationSlug`, or an `issueUrl`.

organizationSlug.description: The organization's slug. You can find a existing list of organizations you have access to using the `find_organizations()` tool.

issueUrl.description: The URL of the issue. e.g. https://my-organization.sentry.io/issues/PROJECT-1Z43
